title: Wanting high bronze - Low silver players (WA pref)
body:
Hey guys
I am currently helping out a small team and for the past month ive recognised that only 2 players are legit and the other 3 arent
They placed into quarter finals in an event on april 
And i reckon we could easily make finals by improving with the team 
Preferred it if you lived in Perth area aka 1h away from it or whatever
Needing a mid laner currently as i got rid of him for his toxicity
And would like to have a new top and adc 
add me on DV ARJAY or DG AU2K1N6
https://discord.gg/6W5krz

replies.body:
Hey, I'm interested.
Although I do live in the NSW state, I'm pretty flexible during Saturday.
I'm a Mid Laner Main, and my champ pool is pretty toxic in itself:
{{champion:238}} {{champion:157}} {{champion:134}} {{champion:1}} {{champion:63}} 
I can fill in to Top lane role if you want to do a lane swap thing.
Hey im interested, im a gold support main but my all my other roles are probably low silver. I live in perth and can play most days after work and mon/tues all day.

I fit the bill for your Mid. Perth... and old as fuck, so no salt here. Just soggy weetbix.
I have a good pool... as in I main Vlad... and pretty much just Vlad...
But Have several others I use too.
GOD Tier:
{{champion:8}} {{champion:115}}
TOP Tier:
{{champion:43}} {{champion:61}}{{champion:30}} {{champion:25}}
MID Tier:
{{champion:38}} {{champion:96}} {{champion:127}} {{champion:99}} {{champion:103}} 


But is there any links to your remaining players games?
I'm talking some OP.GG, I'm talking footage on the youtubes, I'm talking replays.
Unowotimeanm8?

PS - I also cook a mean Poro Steak...

hey mate
Gonna add you in a bit
If you have discord ill be able too talk to you over a call and makes everything 2 times easier

Hey man, silver 4 player here (low silver past 2 seasons also), can play top but live in NSW... do we have to show up in person or just online? Do you guys use teamspeak?

> add me on DV ARJAY or DG AU2K1N6

Does that mean if you are platinum but smurf as a silver in the team it's allowed? :)

hey mate
for the team we all use discord
So much better
Ehh last question is yeah its ok
